verses.roman:
namasye tvāmbike 'bhīkṣṇaṁ
sva-santāna-yutāṁ śivām
bhūyāt patir me bhagavān
kṛṣṇas tad anumodatām

synonyms: namasye—I offer my obeisances; tvā—to you; ambike—O Ambikā; abhīkṣṇam—constantly; sva—your; santāna—children; yutām—along with; śivām—the wife of Lord Śiva; bhūyāt—may He become; patiḥ—husband; me—my; bhagavān—the Supreme Lord; kṛṣṇaḥ—Kṛṣṇa; tat—that; anumodatām—please allow.
translation: [Princess Rukmiṇī prayed:] O mother Ambikā, wife of Lord Śiva, I repeatedly offer my obeisances unto you, together with your children. May Lord Kṛṣṇa become my husband. Please grant this!
